subject: Football
lead_paragraph: After finishing with a 12-4 record and winning the N.F.C. South with a defense ranked second in the N.F.L. behind the Seattle Seahawks, the Panthers have wiped the smiles off skeptics’ faces.
snippet: After finishing with a 12-4 record and winning the N.F.C. South with a defense ranked second in the N.F.L. behind the Seattle Seahawks, the Panthers have wiped the smiles off skeptics’ faces.
